alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Lee; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lee, north central Clarendon and central Sumter Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 601 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Sumter, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sumter, South Sumter, Alcolu, Mayesville, East Sumter, Gable, Brogdon and Lakewood. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 119 and 135. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
